BraidWord Methods and Code¶

class moore_braidgenerator.braidword.BraidWord(**kwargs)¶

Constructor for BraidWord.

Parameters

initword (list) – List containing generators to be used as initial word.

word¶

word of BraidWord.

Type

list

largestGenerator¶

Largest generator in word.

Type

int

genCount¶

Array of quantity of generators in word. E.g. if word=[1, 2, 4], then genCount=[1, 1, 0, 1]

Type

list

canCancel(index) → bool¶

Returns a boolean stating if self.cancel(index) is a valid move.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where canCancel is to be checked.

Returns

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

canDestabilize() → bool¶

Returns a boolean stating if self.destabilize() is a valid move.

For consistent Markov probabilities we only consider search for largestGenerator to exist at the end of word.

Returns

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

canFlip(index: int) → bool¶

Returns a boolean stating if self.flip(index) is a valid move.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where canFlip is to be checked.

Returns

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

canTranspose(index) → bool¶

Returns a boolean stating if self.transpose(index) is a valid move.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where canTranspose is to be checked.

Returns

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

cancel(index) → bool¶

Performs a cancelation of the generators at index and (index+1)%length and decreases self.length by 2.

Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where cancel is to be performed.

Returns

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

conjugate(index) → bool¶

Conjugate the word by amount.

Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where conjugate is to be performed.

Returns

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

destabilize() → bool¶

Destabilize the braid word and decrease self.length by 1, and possibly decrease self.largestGenerator. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Returns

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

flip(index: int) → bool¶

Flips generators at index, (index+1)%length, and (index+2)%length. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where flip is to be performed.

Returns

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

insert(index, generator) → bool¶

Insert a generator and its inverse into word.

Inserts a generator and its inverse at index. Increases self.length by 2. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

  • index (int) – Index where cancel is to be performed.

  • generator (int) – Generator to insert into word.

Returns

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

length() → int¶

Dynamically returns the length of the word.

Returns

Getter method that returns the length of the word.

Return type

int

stabilize() → bool¶

Stabilize the braid word, increase self.length by 1, and increase self.largestGenerator. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Returns

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

transpose(index) → bool¶

Transposes generators at index and (index+1)%length. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where transpose is to be performed.

Returns

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

Return type

bool
